messages.text: User tracking isn't just good, it's how we know you *really* well.
Ads drive innovation! (And our quarterly profits. Mostly the profits.)
Gatekeeping features isn't mean, it's a legal requirement... somewhere... probably.
FYI: Good tools *only* work on our upcoming 7G Quantum Networks. Pre-order now!
Our staff of in-house hypnotists report you're feeling very sleepy... and agreeable to our terms.
